doc.field: Adler & Neilson Iron Work Company architectural drawings
Adler & Neilson Iron Work Company architectural drawings

Roosevelt Raceway/Racetrack, various buildings, Westbury, NY, 1956-1957 (9 folders); Allied Railing (Roosevelt Raceway), 1956; Kenneth Hargraves and Co., (Roosevelt Raceway), 1957; Lockwaood, Kessler and Bartlett (Raceway), 1957; Klemp Metal Grating Corp., (Raceway), 1957; Ruben and Malden Restaurant and Gas Station, NYS Thruway, 1956; Crew Quarters, 240th St., NYC, 1956; Garden State Plaza, 1956; 111-113 East 38th St., NYC, 1956; 74th St., Power plant, NYC Transit System, 1958
Adler & Neilson Iron Work Company architectural drawings
